dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Bloc Party
dmca.body:
Notice of Infringement and Declaration
 
TO:  Google Inc.
        Alexander MacGillivray
        Intellectual Property Counsel
        1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
        Mountain View, CA  94043
        Country:    US
        Phone:  +1-650-623-5439
        Fax: +1-650-618-1806
        support@blogger.com
        amac@google.com
        removals@google.com
        arin-contact@google.com
        abuse@google.com
 

REGARDING:  http://mydirtylies.blogspot.com/2006/11/bloc-party-weekend-in-city.html
 

The following blog offers links to unauthorized material from the artists BLOC PARTY and must be removed immediately:
 
http://mydirtylies.blogspot.com/2006/11/bloc-party-weekend-in-city.html

 

 
I, the undersigned, do solemnly and sincerely declare and CERTIFY UNDER
PENALTY OF PERJURY that:
 
1. I am the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named  ATLANTIC RECORDS GROUP ("IP Owner").
 
2. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials identified
in the addendum attached hereto are NOT AUTHORIZED by the above IP Owner,
its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner
